response.job_title: S&CC Senior Consultant at PwC Colombia | Circular economy | Carbon markets | Sustainable finance | Sustainability | Master Cum Laude in Environmental Management | Chemical Engineer
response.summary: Magister (cum Laude) in Environmental Management, chemical engineer, bilingual (Spanish – English), Environmental and Energetic Management, and Project Management specialist. With knowledge of circular economy, Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) and product/process sustainability analysis, air quality modelling, and of Project Management Institute® (PMI®) methodology. Interested in management of projects of the previously mentioned topics and in new challenges in environment and sustainability in the territorial and organizational context. Abilities in team coordination and leadership, and with the capability of highlight environmental connotations and characteristics of the diverse kinds of projects and productive activities. Experience of more than 5 years in operational good practices training projects participation and leadership.
response.skills: Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG), Environmental Awareness, Sustainable Finance, Cambio climático, Fast Learner, Dedication to work, Simulación de procesos, Ingeniería química, Project Management, Control de procesos, Ingeniería de procesos, Investigación, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Project, Liderazgo de equipos, Trabajo en equipo

profile_positions.description: Consulting on sustainability e-learning topics, environmental footprint measurement and offsetting, as well as corporate sustainability reporting.
profile_positions.title: Sustainability Innovation Consultant

profile_positions.description: Execution of the sustainability consulting process within the framework of the ConsultAndes program of the Master in Environmental Management, where the client analysis, proposal structuring, LCA product delivery, analysis reports and closing of the consulting project were carried out.
profile_positions.title: Consultandes Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Dar cumplimiento a las necesidades del cliente por medio de la elaboración de herramientas de entrenamiento en proceso y control, como soluciones de entrenamiento para nuevos operadores de plantas de transporte dentro del marco de la excelencia operacional. Estas soluciones de entrenamiento involucran las siguientes herramientas y aspectos:
- Elaboración de Diagramas Grandes de Control (DGC) basados en Diagramas de Flujo de Proceso (PFDs) y P&IDs.
- Manual de Descripción de Procesos de la Unidad (MDPU): Descripción General y Específica del proceso, Operaciones Unitarias, Diagramas de Descripción y Relación de Parámetros , y Control de Procesos, incluyendo las desviaciones por alta y por baja (según corresponda), fuera de la ventana de operación.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero Junior B

profile_positions.description: Development support to the supervisor and superintendent of Drilling & Blasting from Carbones del Cerrejón Ltd, North Emulsion Plant (Cerrejón – Indumil).
profile_positions.title: Engineering Internship

profile_positions.description: Worked with the candidates for Major of Bogotá on the logistics and preparation of the forum-debate “Bogotá: Visión Ambiental” (“Bogotá: Environmental Vision”), a discussion of environmental topics listed in each of the government proposals. Also, helped as an assistant in Bogotá’s air quality measurements for Oscar Noreña’s Ch.E. degree project requirement. Measurements were performed with air sampling equipment (formaldehydes and acetaldehydes – DNPH filters).
profile_positions.title: Scholar Assistant

company.name: PwC Colombia
company.description: PricewaterhouseCoopers ayuda a organizaciones e individuos a crear el valor que están buscando. Somos una red de firmas en 157 países con más de 180.000 personas. En Colombia somos más de 1600 personas comprometidas a ofrecer calidad en los servicios de Auditoría, Consultoría Gerencial, Asesoría Legal y Tributaria, y Outsourcing.
